page.title: 20Freedom
page.content: The production of the{MOTOR CAR}some 100 years ago has had a dramatic effect on village life over those years. Before the advent of the car some villagers hardly ever left the confines of the village during their whole life-time. Now-a-days most villagers are able to{TRAVEL}virtually at will. Linked with this freedom to travel has been an increase in{LEISURE {TIME}due to shorter working hours.This has led to people wanting and becoming involved in more and more leisure pursuits. In Wolvey there is a plethora of activities covering all age groups. With increased{MOBILITY } villagers can now go to nearby towns for activities not provided in the village. Compiled by pupils and staff of Wolvey C.E. Combined School.
